title: Which future is more possible, a world armed to the teeth or an arms-less world? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, there are currently more than enough guns for every man, woman and child to have at least one. I’m not sure how many of which weapons you need to be considered “armed to the teeth”, but the chances of every human being voluntarily disarming are zero. Unless you count a world without humans as “a world without arms”. That’s more likely than mandatory universal disarmament or a universal requirement to be armed.
